title: Questionnaire CCARS Medication Psychiatric Service
description: Identifies medication/psychiatry service only clients as defined in 2 CCR 502-1, Section 21.190.7 MEDICATION/PSYCHIATRIC SERVICES ONLY AT MENTAL HEALTH CENTERS AND CLINICS [Eff. 11/1/13].
